data.weather: It has been a generally dry week, with the exception of a few showers of rain that put down 2mm on Sunday, 1.5mm on Monday & 1mm on Tuesday night. It was very windy from Sunday night to Tuesday night. Less windy on Wednesday & Thursday. Dry during Friday, but 2mm rain overnight into Saturday. 2mm since 9am, still steady rain. Outlook: Saturday's forecast remains wet, but perhaps not quite as severe as previous, however, at least 5mm expected, with rain expected from 9am.

However, with forecast of rain Sunday night and showers on Monday it is likely ground will revert back to soft all the way around. Please give me a call if you have any questions on 07767 802206. We all look forward to seeing you on Monday and wrap up warm!! David
